name: Rocket Launcher
entries: Explosive 10. Upon a hit, everything within a radius determined by its explosive value of the target must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC equal to 8 + the firearm's tier x2) or take an additional damage equal to the damage roll. If the weapon attack misses, the explosive ammunition fails to detonate. Explosive weapons have their misfire score increased by 1.
Barrel 1. A barrel is a chamber that holds a number of rounds. You can spend a Bonus Action to reload a single round in your barrel.
